name: Mizu O Nagasu
description:
'Mizu o Nagasu' literally translates as 'Let flow in the water', or, as the phrase is more commonly known in the West, water under the bridge. Taking inspiration from the Japanese woodblock art of Hokusai, and Japanese mythology, folklore and poetry, Mizu o Nagasu tells a story of forgiveness.

Play as Ama or Tsuku, an elderly couple recently parted after an argument, who discover a new world where myth and reality join together. They must navigate through the waves that toss to the surface creatures both familiar and extraordinary.
